title: Programming Concepts
description: Introduces fundamental programming concepts using a high-level programming language.

title: Object Oriented Programming
description: Teaches object-oriented programming concepts such as classes, inheritance, and polymorphism.

title: Data Structures
description: Covers fundamental data structures like arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, and trees.

title: Computer Ethics
description: Examines ethical issues and responsibilities in the computing profession.

title: Design & Analysis of Algorithms
description: Studies algorithm design techniques and analyzes algorithm efficiency.

title: Fundamentals of Database
description: Covers database concepts including modeling, SQL, and relational databases.

title: Software Engineering
description: Introduces software development processes, design principles, and project management.

title: Operating Systems
description: Studies operating system concepts including processes, memory management, and file systems.

title: Fundamentals of Cybersecurity
description: Explores principles of information security, threats, and protection techniques.

title: Web Development Fundamentals
description: Covers basic front-end and back-end web development technologies.
